title: # 451 - Maz Jobrani & ME
description:
Today I sit down with comedian Maz Jobrani. We talk about the insurrection, The Muslim ban, Iranian history, stand up during covid, his new special, and much more!  

 

Maz has a new special “Pandemic Warrior” available now on Peacock! 

 

Check out my new show “Go Big Show” Thursdays at 9pm PST on TBS! 

 

This episode is brought to you by Peacock - Home of Comedy. Get started for free at http://www.peacocktv.com and start streaming today. 

 

This episode is also brought to you by Manscaped. Get 20% Off and Free Shipping with the code BERT at http://www.Manscaped.com   

 

This episode is also brought to you by cbdMD. Get 25% OFF your next order when you use the promo code “BERT” at checkout. Go to http://www.cbdmd.com and use the code “Bert” at checkout. 

 

This episode is also brought to you by Ketum Superior Kratom. Check out Ketum at http://www.shopketum.com and use promo code BIGBERT for 20% off ALL Ketum products.

 

This episode is also brought to you by Better Help. Get 10% off your first month with the discount code “BERT”. Get started today at http://www.betterhelp.com/bert  

 

This episode is also brought to you by 1-800 Contacts. So, let 1-800 Contacts get you the contacts lenses you need. Order online at http://www.1800contacts.com   

 

 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com 

Twitter: http://www.Twitter.com/bertkreischer 

Facebook: http://www.Facebook.com/BertKreischer 

Instagram: http://www.Instagram.com/bertkreischer 

Youtube: http://www.Youtube.com/user/Akreischer
